TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MaskedTextProvider extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: 表示可由支持掩码的任何数量的控件（如 控件）使用的掩码分析服务。

span.span: Represents a mask-parsing service that can be used by any number of controls that support masking, such as the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件包含掩码，组成原义字符和格式设置，它测试针对的所有用户输入元素。The control contains a mask, composed of literal characters and formatting elements, that it tests all user input against. 而不是永久关联与特定掩码分析引擎，Windows 窗体提供它作为单独的服务，由表示类，该类定义的文档中讨论的屏蔽语言的语法属性。Instead of permanently associating a specific mask-parsing engine with , Windows Forms provides it as a separate service, represented by the class, which defines the syntax of the masking language discussed in the documentation for the property. 成员的许多类，请参阅同样名称的成员以及关联到其实现。Many of the members of the class refer their implementation to similarly named members of the associated . 例如，属性类引用到的所有访问的类。For example, the property of the class refers all access to the of the class. 由使用的掩码分析引擎仿效掩码的编辑控件包含在 Microsoft Visual Basic 版本 6。The mask-parsing engine used by is modeled after the Masked Edit control included in Microsoft Visual Basic version 6. 中的文档介绍了其屏蔽语言属性。Its masking language is described in the documentation for the property. 所涉及以下三个不同字符串类。The following three distinct strings are involved with the class. |字符串名称String name|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |输入的字符或字符串Input character or string|表示用作该蒙板应用针对的输入的字符。Represents the characters used as input that the mask is applied against. 在现实中，输入的字符串可能组合的多个输入的操作，包括， ， ，和。In actuality, the input string may be composed of multiple input operations, including , , , and . 因此，不能直接访问输入的字符串。Therefore, the input string cannot be accessed directly. 输入的字符串处理方面但是，但是也可用和， ，和属性。However, aspects of the input string handling are available though the and , , and properties.| |掩码Mask|表示的输入格式掩码，用于将输入的字符串转换为带格式的字符串。Represents the input formatting mask used to transform the input string into the formatted string. 在中设置此字符串和但主要访问属性。This string is set in the and accessed primarily though the property. 掩码的特征也有通过其他成员，如， ，和属性。Characteristics of the mask are also available through other members, such as the , , and properties.| |带格式的字符串Formatted string|表示生成完整的掩码应用于输入字符串时的字符串。Represents the string that results when the full mask is applied to the input string. 带格式的字符串可以查询具有很多成员的类，包括， ， ， ， ， ，依次类推。The formatted string can be queried with many members of the class, including , , , , , , and so on. 格式化字符串的全部价值是可从和方法。The full value of the formatted string is available from the and methods.| > [!NOTE] > 输入的字符串可能表示直接用户输入，如下所示的大小写，也可能由其他进程不直接与用户输入/输出操作来生成。The input string may represent direct user input, as in the case of the , or may be generated by other processes not directly associated with user input/output operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数表示最常见的重载的形式。This constructor represents the most general overloaded form. `mask`参数必须符合定义的屏蔽语言类，该类详细介绍了属性类。The `mask` parameter must conform to the masking language defined by the class, which is detailed in the property of the class. 因为非特定区域性无法查询有关特定于区域性的信息，构造函数将使用方法搜索要使用来确定适当的分隔符字符的第一个非特定于区域性。Because neutral cultures cannot be queried for culture-specific information, the constructor will use the method to search for the first non-neutral culture to use to determine the proper separator characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将添加`input`字符在格式化字符串的第一个可用位置的值最后一个被赋值，表示在位置后属性。The method adds the `input` character value to the first available position in the formatted string after the position that was last assigned, which is represented by the property. 此方法将任何由于以下原因失败：This method will fail for any of the following reasons: - 输入的值， `input`，不是可打印，或与掩码的对应元素不匹配。The input value, `input`, is not printable, or it does not match its corresponding mask element. - 有零个可用的编辑位置在格式化字符串，或者没有任何可用的编辑位置后最后分配位置。There are zero available edit positions in the formatted string, or there are no available edit positions after the last assigned position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将添加从字符`input`字符串开头的第一个可用位置后的格式化字符串。The method adds the characters from the `input` string to the formatted string, starting with the first available position after . 此方法将任何由于以下原因失败：This method will fail for any of the following reasons: - 任何在输入的值中，字符`input`，是不可打印或输入的值与掩码的对应元素不匹配。Any of the characters in the input value, `input`, are not printable, or the input value does not match its corresponding mask element. - 没有足够可用的编辑位置带格式的字符串中最后一个分配位置后。There are not enough available edit positions in the formatted string after the last assigned position. 如果此方法失败，会进行任何添加并且该方法返回`false`。If this method fails, no additions are made and the method returns `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将一个字符插入到达到或超过指定的第一个编辑位置`pos`参数。The method inserts a character into the first edit position at or beyond that specified by the `pos` parameter. 此方法将移动现有的所有字符，将插入点移动一个位置，以便腾出空间供插入之后`input`字符。This method will shift all existing characters after the insertion point over by one position to make room for the inserted `input` character. 如果发生以下错误之一，则不执行插入操作，并且该方法返回`false`。If one of the following errors occurs, the insertion is not performed, and the method returns `false`. - `pos`参数小于零或大于的格式化字符串。The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the formatted string. - 达到或超过指定的位置的格式化字符串中找不到可编辑的字符`pos`。An editable character was not found in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`. - 插入字符， `input`，不是有效的输入的字符，因为它不是可打印或与掩码的对应元素不匹配。The insertion character, `input`, is not a valid input character because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element. - 没有可用的位置插入点，右侧，以便不能移动现有的字符。There are no available positions to the right of the insertion point, so that existing characters cannot be shifted. - 移动现有的字符会产生与掩码的冲突。Shifting the existing characters would produce a violation of the mask. 一个空`input`字符串将导致没有更改中的格式化字符串，但会返回`true`。An empty `input` string will cause no change in the formatted string, but will return `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将从每个字符插入`input`字符串插入编辑位置位于位置`pos`甚至更高。The method inserts each character from the `input` string into the edit positions located at position `pos` and beyond. 插入点移动一个位置，每个插入字符后，此方法将移动现有的所有字符。This method will shift all existing characters after the insertion point over by one position for each inserted character. 如果发生以下错误之一，不会执行插入，并且该方法返回`false`。If one of the following errors occurs, no insertion is performed, and the method returns `false`. - `pos`参数小于零或大于的格式化字符串。The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the formatted string. - 在达到或超过指定的位置的格式化字符串中存在足够可编辑字符`pos`，无法插入所有的字符`input`字符串。Not enough editable characters exist in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`, to insert all of the characters from the `input` string. - 一个或多个插入字符不是有效的输入的字符因为它们是不可打印的或与其相应的掩码元素不匹配。One or more of the insertion characters are not a valid input character because they are not printable or do not match their corresponding mask element. - 没有足够的可用位置右侧的插入点，以便能移动现有的字符。There are not enough available positions to the right of the insertion point, so that existing characters cannot be shifted. - 移动现有的字符会产生与掩码的冲突。Shifting the existing characters would produce a violation of the mask. 请注意，都会发生此移动的每个单个字符插入期间。Note that this shifting occurs during the insertion of each individual character. 一个空`input`字符串将导致没有更改中的格式化字符串，但会返回`true`。An empty `input` string will cause no change in the formatted string, but will return `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不起如果指定的删除位置没有分配的字符。The method has no effect if there are no assigned characters at the removal position specified. 原义字符不受此方法。Literal characters are not affected by this method. 在删除一个字符后，将向左填充在删除过程产生的间隙移动掩码中的剩余高位字符。When a character is removed, the remaining higher-positioned characters in the mask will shift to the left to fill in the gap created by the removal. 输入将重置空出的位置。Vacated positions are reset for input. 如果移动字符阻止的掩码定义，不会发生移除，和返回`false`。If movement of the characters is prevented by the mask definition, no removal occurs, and returns `false`. 此方法调用是完全等效于对重载的以下调用版本：This method call is exactly equivalent to the following call to the overloaded version: `RemoveAt(pos, pos);`

remarks.format: ## Remarks 达到或超过指定的位置的格式化字符串中的第一个可编辑位置的方法搜索`pos`。The method searches for the first editable position in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`. 如果找到一个对象，则可编辑的位置的值更改为指定的字符， `input`。If one is found, the value of the editable position is changed to the specified character, `input`. 以下任何条件将导致错误，导致执行不替换和的值`false`要返回：Any of the following conditions will result in an error that causes no replacement to be performed and a value of `false` to be returned: - `pos`参数小于零或大于的格式化字符串。The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the formatted string. - 达到或超过指定的位置的格式化字符串中找不到可编辑的字符`pos`。An editable character was not found in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`. - 替换字符， `input`，不是有效的输入的字符，因为它不是可打印或与掩码的对应元素不匹配。The replacement character, `input`, is not a valid input character because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 达到或超过指定的位置的第一个可编辑位置的方法搜索`pos`。The method searches for the first editable position at or beyond the specified position, `pos`. 在假定在此点后有足够的可编辑位置下运行，现有的字符值都将使用替换字符串参数的内容一对一被替换的`input`。Operating under the assumption that there are enough editable positions after this point, the existing character values are replaced one-by-one with the contents of the replacement string parameter, `input`. 以下情况被视为错误。The following conditions are considered errors. 当发生错误时，没有可以代替发生和返回`false`。When an error occurs, no replacement occurs and returns `false`. - `pos`参数小于零或大于的格式化字符串。The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the formatted string. - 没有足够存放的替换字符串内容的格式化字符串中可编辑的位置。There are not enough editable positions in the formatted string to hold the contents of the replacement string. - 替换字符值之一不有效，因为它不是可打印或与掩码的对应元素不匹配。One of the replacement character values is not valid because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法搜索指定的起始和结束位置之间的格式化字符串中的第一个可编辑位置。The method searches for the first editable position in the formatted string between the specified starting and ending positions. 如果找到一个对象，则可编辑的位置的值更改为指定的字符， `input`。If one is found, the value of the editable position is changed to the specified character, `input`. 以下任何条件将导致错误条件导致要执行不替换和的值`false`要返回：Any of the following conditions will result in an error condition that causes no replacement to be performed and a value of `false` to be returned: - `startPos`或`endPos`参数点早于开始日期的格式字符串或其末尾之后。The `startPos` or `endPos` parameters point before the start of the formatted string or beyond its end. - 在指定时间段内找不到可编辑的字符。An editable character was not found in the specified interval. - 替换字符， `input`，不是有效的输入的字符，因为它不是可打印或与掩码的对应元素不匹配。The replacement character, `input`, is not a valid input character because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element. 除了返回的值，此方法具有两个输出参数，可提供有关在替换操作的其他信息。In addition to the return value, this method has two output parameters to supply additional information about the replacement operation.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定应如何处理与提示字符匹配的输入字符。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how an input character that matches the prompt character should be handled.

value.span: 如果输入的提示字符会导致掩码中的当前可编辑位置被重置，则为 ；否则为 ，以指示要将提示字符作为正常输入字符进行处理。

span.span: if the prompt character entered as input causes the current editable position in the mask to be reset; otherwise, to indicate that the prompt character is to be processed as a normal input character.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以特殊方式，可以将两种类别的字符，空白字符和提示字符。 can treat two categories of characters, paces and prompt characters, in a special manner. 通常情况下，将对照掩码并测试每个输入的字符接受或拒绝。Normally, each input character will be tested against the mask and either accepted or rejected. 假定在属性设置为值`null`，然后设置属性`true`将导致对提示字符特殊处理。Operating on the assumption that the property is set to a value other than `null`, then setting the property to `true` will result in special processing for the prompt character. 添加提示字符，它会导致要清除的当前掩码字符位置和当前位置，以推进到下一个可编辑的字符。When a prompt character is added, it causes the current mask character position to be cleared and the current position to be advanced to the next editable character. 将优先于下表中所述的属性。 takes precedence over the property as described in the following table. |||产生的行为Resulting behavior| |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------| |`true`|`true`|可以添加提示字符并使掩码当前位置，以重置。The prompt character can be added and it causes the current mask position to be reset. 默认值。The default.| |`true`|`false`|可以添加提示字符并使掩码当前位置，以重置。The prompt character can be added and it causes the current mask position to be reset.| |`false`|`true`|提示字符被处理为普通的输入字符。The prompt character is processed as a normal input character.| |`false`|`false`|提示字符无效，并且尝试将字符添加的方法将失败。The prompt character is not valid and methods attempting to add the character will fail.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以特殊方式，可以将两种类别的字符、 空格和提示字符。 can treat two categories of characters, spaces and prompt characters, in a special manner. 通常情况下，将对照掩码并测试每个输入的字符接受或拒绝。Normally, each input character will be tested against the mask and either accepted or rejected. 设置属性`true`将导致要清除的当前掩码字符位置和当前推进到下一个可编辑的字符的位置。Setting the property to `true` will result in the current mask character position being cleared and the current position being advanced to the next editable character. 时非常有用将文本分配已保存排除出现提示时，其中提示符将被替换为空格。 is useful when assigning text that was saved excluding the prompt, where the prompt is replaced with a space. 还原此类字符串，设置之前到`true`将重置占用输入字符串中的空格的位置的提示字符。Before restoring such a string, setting to `true` will reset the prompt characters at the positions occupied by spaces in the input string.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示掩码中的原义字符位置是否可由其相同的值覆盖。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether literal character positions in the mask can be overwritten by their same values.

value.span: 如果允许往回添加原义字符，则为 ；如果不允许用户覆盖原义字符，则为 。

span.span: to allow literals to be added back; otherwise, to not allow the user to overwrite literal characters.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入的掩码可以包含文本，并可编辑的字符。Input masks can contain literal and editable characters. 如果尝试添加为文本、 的值所占据的掩码中的位置的输入的字符属性确定结果。If an attempt is made to add an input character to the position in a mask occupied by a literal, the value of the property determines the result. - 如果此属性为`true`，可使用相同的值覆盖原义，添加将输入的字符时。If this property is `true`, it is valid to overwrite a literal with the same value when adding input characters. 例如，正斜杠字符值`'/'`，无法添加到掩码的第三个位置`"00/00/000"`。For example, a forward slash character value, `'/'`, could be added to the third position of the mask `"00/00/000"`. - 如果此属性为`false`，所以不能将任何值分配给由原义字符占据的掩码位置。If this property is `false`, it is not valid to assign any value to a mask position occupied by a literal character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 则称该字符为*转义*如果它是有效的值，但未分配给格式化字符串中的位置。A character is said to be *escaped* if it is valid input, but is not assigned to that position in the formatted string. 转义字符分为以下三个类别：Escaped characters fall into the following three categories: - 如果提示字符进行转义属性是`true`。Prompt characters are escaped if the property is `true`. - 如果它们具有相同的值与该文本在掩码中，并且将输入的字符进行转义属性是`true`。Input characters are escaped if they have the same value as the literal in the mask, and if the property is `true`. - 如果转义空格字符属性是`true`。Space characters are escaped if the property is `true`. 方法还将返回`false`如果`pos`参数小于零或大于的。The method will also return `false` if the `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the .
